channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pauple -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29110|2024-03-19T15:07:40.695Z -- Pauple -- Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pauple Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome: from n/a through 1.0.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-31388|2024-04-15T10:11:48.203Z -- Pauple -- Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Pauple Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome.This issue affects Table & Contact Form 7 Database – Tablesome: from n/a through 1.0.25.
